pathways.title: Returning to work
pathways.teaser: 12-week ramp back: kinder structure, small experiments, honest boundaries.
pathways.audience: Professionals returning after caregiving, health, study, or relocation.
pathways.focus: Rebuild routines, update your story, and rehearse boundaries you can actually keep.

pathways.title: Graduate start
pathways.teaser: Shape a clear story and turn it into testable, visible actions.
pathways.audience: Graduates and early-career hires shaping their first UK roles.
pathways.focus: Translate projects into proof points, test options, and build confidence with scripts you trust.

pathways.title: New to the UK job market
pathways.teaser: Translate overseas work into local proof points you can show.
pathways.audience: People who trained or worked overseas and now need UK stories and sponsorship clarity.
pathways.focus: Localise your narrative, map networks and access needs, and rehearse confident conversations.

hero.title: Start from the pathway that sounds most like you.
hero.subtitle: Career return, graduate start, or navigating the UK market — each pathway explains who it serves and the structure you can expect.

pathways_intro: See where you recognise yourself first. If you are weighing up whether coaching is the right container, the Readiness guide explains what helps the work land.
title: Services — Pathways you can start today
description: Three focused pathways show who they support, how we meet, and how we get started together.
